attributes.action: increase the amount of school holidays
attributes.background: The government should increase the amount of school holidays because parents won't have the need to take school days off and get fined. In addition, more school days will lead to mental distress because of more stress of school

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petitions:

Require two-week half-term breaks and longer summer holidays at all schools: 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/654505

Extend the school summer holidays to eight weeks: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/655596
